title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: We are pleased to announce our new line of offshore dedicated servers in Vietnam with unmetered bandwidth and 100mbps uplink (option to upgrade to 1gbps).All Vietnam servers are covered by our offshore privacy policy and uptime guarantee.You can view new line of offshore Vietnam dedicated servers here: https://www.zakservers.com/offshore-dedicated-servers.phpBitcoin is accepted as a payment method.
